## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irmaterializationunit">IRMaterializationUnit</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irmaterializationunit">IRMaterializationUnit</a> is a convenient base class for MaterializationUnits wrapping LLVM IR. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irmaterializationunit/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irlayer">IRLayer</a></>}>
Interface for layers that accept LLVM IR. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irlayer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/basicirlayermaterializationunit">BasicIRLayerMaterializationUnit</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/materializationunit">MaterializationUnit</a> that materializes modules by calling the &#39;emit&#39; method on the given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irlayer">IRLayer</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/basicirlayermaterializationunit/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/objectlayer">ObjectLayer</a></>}>
Interface for Layers that accept object files. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/objectlayer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/basicobjectlayermaterializationunit">BasicObjectLayerMaterializationUnit</a></>}>
Materializes the given object file (represented by a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> instance) by calling &#39;emit&#39; on the given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/objectlayer">ObjectLayer</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/basicobjectlayermaterializationunit/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Sets the CloneToNewContextOnEmit flag (false by default).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When set, IR modules added to this layer will be cloned on to a new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// context before emit is called. This can be used by clients who want</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to load all IR using one LLVMContext (to save memory via type and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// constant uniquing), but want to move Modules to fresh contexts before</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// compiling them to enable concurrent compilation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Single threaded clients, or clients who load every module on a new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// context, need not set this.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irlayer/#a9c064a010c4aaeb1df5ed5d5f4ef6de8"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/irlayer/#a9c064a010c4aaeb1df5ed5d5f4ef6de8">setCloneToNewContextOnEmit</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CloneToNewContextOnEmit) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    this-&gt;CloneToNewContextOnEmit = CloneToNewContextOnEmit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
